__e: These photos were found in your home.
Action and emotion is found in every love story but in this love story, there is a twist that you all have never seen before.
But if you have any questions, the answers can be found somewhere in there.
And sometimes, in darkness, find answers that can not be found in the light.
What are we doing here, then?
Besides, if this stuff was all found at the same source, any part may lead us there.
And you have absolutely no right to an arrest warrant... based on the photographs found therein.
So the only thing our two vics have in common is they were both found in the park.
Perhaps the answers can be found not in the here and now, but in another place and time.
